section.p: This section lists and describes any healthcare encounters pertinent to the patient's current health status or historical health history. An encounter is an interaction, regardless of the setting, between a patient and a practitioner who is vested with primary responsibility for diagnosing, evaluating, or treating the patient's condition. It may include visits, appointments, as well as non-face-to-face interactions. It is also a contact between a patient and a practitioner who has primary responsibility (exercising independent judgment) for assessing and treating the patient at a given contact. This section may contain all encounters for the time period being summarized, but should include notable encounters.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-8705, CONF:1198-10387, CONF:1198-32548 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22.1"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Encounters Section Entries Optional2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22:2015-08-01)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="NI" (CONF:1198-32815)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15466)/@code="46240-8" Encounters (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15467, CONF:1198-31137)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1198-8707)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-8708)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-8709, CONF:1198-15468)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present:
Conforms to Encounter Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.49:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Encounters Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22)
SHALL conform to Encounters Section Entries Optional2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22:2015-08-01)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="NI" (CONF:1198-32815)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15466)/@code="46240-8" Encounters (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15467, CONF:1198-31137)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-8708)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1198-8707)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7951, CONF:1198-15465)
Conforms to Encounter Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.49:2015-08-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-8709, CONF:1198-15468)
Conforms to Encounter Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.49:2015-08-01)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present:

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10387 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22.1"
SHALL conform to Encounters Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22)

Consol Encounters Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:8709, CONF:8803) Conforms to Encounter Activities (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.49)
Consol Encounters Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15466)/@code="46240-8" Encounters (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15467)
Consol Encounters Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8708)
Consol Encounters Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8707)
